products.title: Bag - Medium
products.desc: The 'Standard' size of our dicebag, holding approx. 50 dice of normal size.  Two colors, 14g AWG/1.6mm rings, leather cord and cord stop.

products.title: Bracelet - Alligator Back
products.desc: Two to three colors, 14g AWG/1.6mm rings, Tube Clasp or spacer and any other clasp.

products.title: Bracelet - GSG
products.desc: Two to three colors, 14g AWG/1.6mm rings, lobster claw clasp.

products.title: Bracelet - Half Persian 3-in-1
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp.

products.title: Bracelet - Half Persian 4-in-1
products.desc: A much tighter weave than Half Persian 3-in-1, it holds it's shape nicely at all times.  Two colors, 14g AWG/1.6mm rings, lobster claw clasp.

products.title: Bracelet - Mobius Flower
products.desc: Mobius flowers are done in one or two colors per flower, then another color for connectors.  Additional flower colors cost extra.  14g AWG/1.6mm rings, lobster claw clasp.

products.title: Bracelet - Byzantine
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in Copper and Brass.

products.title: Bracelet - Byzantine Sheet (3 row)
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in Copper, Bronze, and Brass.

products.title: Bracelet - Dragonscale (3 row)
products.desc: So named for the scale-layer like effect, despite not using actual scales to make it.  Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings and 14g AWG/1.6mm rings, tube clasp or spacer and other clasps, pictured in copper and brass.  Five row is available for $40.

products.title: Bracelet - Full Persian
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in copper and bronze.

products.title: Bracelet - Mars
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in copper and brass.

products.title: Bracelet - Dragonsteps
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in aluminium and bronze.

products.title: Bracelet - Celtic Spiral Knot
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in aluminium and bronze.

products.title: Bracelet - Elfin
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in aluminium and bronze.

products.title: Bracelet - Elfweave
products.desc: Two colors, 16g AWG/1.2mm rings, lobster claw clasp, pictured in aluminium and bronze.

products.title: Necklace - Byzantine and Mobius Flower
products.desc: Custom commission.  16g AWG/1.2mm rings for most, 14g AWG/1.6mm rings for the Mobius flower sections.

products.title: Keychain - Full Persian with Mobius Flower
products.desc: A keychain, pictured above in plain aluminium, this can also be made in stainless steel as well as the base metals. 14g AWG/1.6mm rings, single color.
